heroSection.description: This image showcases a beautifully remodeled kitchen with modern gray cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a sleek range hood. The warm lighting and open layout create an inviting atmosphere.
heroSection.callToAction: Elevate your kitchen with our expert design and remodeling services. Contact us today for a free consultation.

heroSection.description: This stylish bathroom features a stunning vessel sink with a copper finish, complemented by dark gray tiles and modern lighting fixtures, creating a luxurious and contemporary ambiance.
heroSection.callToAction: Transform your bathroom into a personal oasis with our skilled craftsmanship and attention to detail. Schedule a consultation now.

heroSection.description: This cozy living room boasts a classic brick fireplace with a modern twist, surrounded by built-in shelving and a mounted TV. The warm tones and inviting atmosphere make it the perfect space for relaxation.
heroSection.callToAction: Enhance your living space with our custom fireplace and built-in solutions. Contact us to bring your vision to life.

aboutUsSection.description: This image showcases the attention to detail and craftsmanship of our team. The intricate tile work and sleek cabinetry demonstrate our commitment to delivering high-quality results.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image highlights our expertise in kitchen and bathroom remodeling, showcasing our ability to create beautiful and functional spaces.

aboutUsSection.description: This before-and-after comparison showcases our team's ability to transform outdated spaces into modern and inviting environments, while preserving the character of the home.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image effectively demonstrates our comprehensive remodeling capabilities, from conceptualization to execution, and our commitment to exceeding client expectations.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Abby Fitzgerald
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Hardworking and helpful. I highly recommend
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: The Construction Artists

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Amanda Davis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Amazing! Prices were very reasonable and I greatly appreciated the written proposal prior to starting so I knew what to expect. Cannot recommend him enough! I needed the original dishwasher (1960s version) removed from my house and the new one installed. The biggest issue was the original was installed 1" below the floor level and from what others said would need to be sawed out. Mike came out and took a look and was able to remove the older dishwasher without sawing and without too much fuss. He was super friendly and worked efficiently.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: The Construction Artists

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Christine Burdick
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We just purchased a home in Columbus and needed a variety of work done from installing floodlights to installing a new dishwasher to assembling a trampoline and child’s play set to assembling and hanging two porch swings to putting new hardware and shower heads in the bathrooms and a few other items. Mike did a great job. Did everything well and as promised. We will definitely use him again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you! It was a pleasure to serve you!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: The Construction Artists

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: A M
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: They complete monthly walk throughs of vacant properties and take photos and complete reports. Very responsive. Prices are reasonable. Communication is great! I would recommend this company.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: The Construction Artists

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: maleah cousineau
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Service was great! Very professional and responsive! Will be reaching out again when the needs arises!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: The Construction Artists

servicesMentioned: monthly walk throughs of vacant properties

aboutUs: At The Construction Artists, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbing professionals dedicated to providing top-notch services to our local community. With our extensive expertise and commitment to excellence, we specialize in a wide range of plumbing solutions, from routine maintenance to complex installations and repairs. Our team takes pride in delivering reliable and efficient services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted and reliable plumbing partner.
sellingPoints: Highly trained and certified technicians with a deep understanding of the latest plumbing techniques and technologies.
Prompt and courteous service, with a focus on minimizing disruptions and ensuring your complete satisfaction.
Comprehensive solutions that address all your plumbing needs, from minor repairs to large-scale installations.
